name: Physics
description: Simulate realistic object physics, powered by Box2D.

conditions.name: Is sleeping
conditions.description: True if the physics object has become inactive and is no longer requiring processing.

conditions.name: Compare velocity
conditions.description: Compare the current velocity of the physics object.

params.name: Which
params.description: Choose whether to compare the velocity on an axis, or the overall velocity.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose how to compare the velocity.

params.name: Value
params.description: Choose the number to compare the velocity to.

conditions.name: Compare angular velocity
conditions.description: Compare the current angular velocity of the physics object.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose how to compare the angular velocity.

params.name: Value
params.description: Choose the number to compare the angular velocity to, in degrees per second.

conditions.name: Compare mass
conditions.description: Compare the current mass of the physics object.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose how to compare the mass.

params.name: Value
params.description: Choose the number to compare the mass to.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is currently enabled.

conditions.name: Is immovable
conditions.description: True if the physics object is set to be immovable (having infinite mass).

actions.name: Apply force
actions.description: Apply a force on the object.

params.name: Force X
params.description: The horizontal force to apply.

params.name: Force Y
params.description: The vertical force to apply.

params.name: Image point
params.description: The name or number of the image point to apply the force at. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

actions.name: Apply force towards position
actions.description: Apply a force on the object towards a position in the layout.
actions.display_text: Apply {my} force {0} toward ([i]{1}[/i], [i]{2}[/i]) at image point {3}

params.name: Force
params.description: The force to apply.

params.name: X
params.description: The X co-ordinate to apply the force towards.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate to apply the force towards.

params.name: Image point
params.description: The name or number of the image point to apply the force at. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

actions.name: Apply force at angle
actions.description: Apply a force on the object in a particular direction.
actions.display_text: Apply {my} force {0} at angle {1} at image point {2}

params.name: Force
params.description: The force to apply.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle, in degrees, to apply the force towards.

params.name: Image point
params.description: The name or number of the image point to apply the force at. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

actions.name: Apply impulse
actions.description: Apply an impulse to the object, as if it were suddenly struck.

params.name: Impulse X
params.description: The horizontal impulse to apply.

params.name: Impulse Y
params.description: The vertical impulse to apply.

params.name: Image point
params.description: The name or number of the image point to apply the impulse at. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

actions.name: Apply impulse towards position
actions.description: Apply an impulse on the object as if it were suddenly struck towards a position in the layout.
actions.display_text: Apply {my} impulse {0} toward ([i]{1}[/i], [i]{2}[/i]) at image point {3}

params.name: Impulse
params.description: The impulse to apply.

params.name: X
params.description: The X co-ordinate to apply the impulse towards.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate to apply the impulse towards.

params.name: Image point
params.description: The name or number of the image point to apply the impulse at. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

actions.name: Apply impulse at angle
actions.description: Apply an impulse on the object as if it were suddenly struck at an angle.
actions.display_text: Apply {my} impulse {0} at angle {1} at image point {2}

params.name: Impulse
params.description: The impulse to apply.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle, in degrees, to apply the impulse at.

params.name: Image point
params.description: The name or number of the image point to apply the impulse at. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

actions.name: Set velocity
actions.description: Set the current motion of the physics object.

params.name: X component
params.description: The X component of the velocity to set, in pixels per second.

params.name: Y component
params.description: The Y component of the velocity to set, in pixels per second.

actions.name: Set world gravity
actions.description: Set the force of gravity on all objects in the world.

params.name: Gravity
params.description: The new force of gravity to set.

actions.name: Set stepping mode
actions.description: Set the way the physics engine steps the simulation.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The stepping mode.  'Fixed' guarantees same results every time but is not framerate independent; 'framerate independent' adjusts to the framerate but may give different results each time.

actions.name: Set stepping iterations
actions.description: Set the performance/accuracy trade-off.
actions.display_text: Set {my} world stepping to {0} velocity iterations and {1} position iterations

params.name: Velocity iterations
params.description: Iterations for the velocity constraint solver.  Lower is fast and inaccurate, higher is slow and accurate.

params.name: Position iterations
params.description: Iterations for the position constraint solver.  Lower is fast and inaccurate, higher is slow and accurate.

actions.name: Enable/disable collisions
actions.description: Enable or disable collisions with another object using the Physics behavior.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose another object type with the Physics behavior to enable or disable collisions for.

params.name: State
params.description: Enable or disable collisions with the given object type.

actions.name: Create distance joint
actions.description: Force this and another object to stay a fixed distance apart, as if connected by a pole.
actions.display_text: Create {my} distance joint from image point {0} to {1} image point {2}, damping ratio {3}, frequency {4}

params.name: This image point
params.description: Name or number of image point on this object to attach joint to. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to attach to.

params.name: That image point
params.description: Name or number of image point on other object to attach joint to.

params.name: Damping ratio
params.description: The joint damping ratio, from 0 (no damping) to 1 (critical damping)

params.name: Spring frequency
params.description: The mass-spring-damper frequency, in Hertz.

actions.name: Create revolute joint
actions.description: Hinge another object to a point on this object.
actions.display_text: Create {my} revolute joint at image point {0} to {1}

params.name: This image point
params.description: Name or number of image point on this object to hinge object to. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to attach.

actions.name: Create limited revolute joint
actions.description: Hinge another object to a point on this object and limit the range of rotation.
actions.display_text: Create {my} limited revolute joint at image point {0} to {1}, from {2} to {3} degrees

params.name: This image point
params.description: Name or number of image point on this object to hinge object to. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to attach.

params.name: Lower angle
params.description: The lower angle of rotation allowed, in degrees.

params.name: Upper angle
params.description: The upper angle of rotation allowed, in degrees.

actions.name: Remove all joints
actions.description: Remove all joints created to or from this object.

actions.name: Set density
actions.description: Set the density of the physics object.

params.name: Density
params.description: The new object density.  Only has effect when 'Immovable' is 'No'.

actions.name: Set friction
actions.description: Set the friction coefficient.

params.name: Friction
params.description: The new object friction coefficient, between 0 and 1.

actions.name: Set elasticity
actions.description: Set the elasticity ('bounciness') coefficient.

params.name: Elasticity
params.description: The new object elasticity (restitution or 'bounciness') coefficient, between 0 and 1.

actions.name: Set linear damping
actions.description: Set the coefficient to slow down motion over time.

params.name: Linear damping
params.description: The new object linear damping, between 0 and 1.

actions.name: Set angular damping
actions.description: Set the coefficient to slow down rotations over time.

params.name: Angular damping
params.description: The new object angular damping, between 0 and 1.

actions.name: Set immovable
actions.description: Set whether the object has infinite mass (immovable)

params.name: Setting
params.description: Set whether the object has infinite mass (immovable).

actions.name: Set prevent rotation
actions.description: Set whether to prevent the object rotating when hit.

params.name: Setting
params.description: Set whether to prevent the object rotating when hit.

actions.name: Set bullet
actions.description: Set whether to use enhanced collision detection for fast-moving objects.

params.name: Bullet
params.description: Set whether to use bullet mode for enhanced collision detection on fast-moving objects.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Enable or disable the behavior.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Choose whether to enable or disable the behavior.

actions.name: Apply torque
actions.description: Apply a torque (i.e. angular acceleration).

params.name: Torque
params.description: The torque to apply to the object.

actions.name: Apply torque towards angle
actions.description: Apply a torque towards an angle.

params.name: Torque
params.description: The magnitude of the torque to apply.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle, in degrees, to apply torque towards.

actions.name: Apply torque towards position
actions.description: Apply a torque towards a position in the layout.

params.name: Torque
params.description: The magnitude of the torque to apply.

params.name: X
params.description: The X co-ordinate in the layout to apply torque towards.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate in the layout to apply torque towards.

actions.name: Set angular velocity
actions.description: Set the rate the object rotates at.

params.name: Angular velocity
params.description: The angular velocity to set, in degrees per second.

actions.name: Create prismatic joint
actions.description: Restrict movement of two objects along a specific axis.
actions.display_text: Create {my} prismatic joint at image point {0} to {1} (angle [i]{2}[/i], limit [i]{3}[/i] from [i]{4}[/i] to [i]{5}[/i], motor [i]{6}[/i] speed [i]{7}[/i] max force [i]{8}[/i])

params.name: This image point
params.description: Name or number of image point on this object to hinge object to. Use 0 for the center of gravity and -1 for the object origin.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to attach.

params.name: Axis angle
params.description: The angle of the axis to constrain movement to, in degrees.

params.name: Enable limit
params.description: Whether to enable the lower and upper translation limits.

params.name: Lower translation
params.description: The lower translation allowed relative to the starting position, in pixels.

params.name: Upper translation
params.description: The upper translation allowed relative to the starting position, in pixels.

params.name: Enable motor
params.description: Whether to enable a motor on the joint.

params.name: Motor speed
params.description: The speed of the motor, in degrees per second.

params.name: Max motor force
params.description: The maximum motor torque.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: Set the position of the physics body to a new location, preserving its velocity.

params.name: X
params.description: The X position to teleport to.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y position to teleport to.

actions.name: Set awake
actions.description: Set whether the Physics engine is actively simulating this object.

params.name: Awake
params.description: Set whether the Physics engine is actively simulating this object.

actions.name: Set collision filter
actions.description: Set a list of tags to filter physics collisions.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Use 'Inclusive' to only collide with Physics objects with the given tags. Use 'Exclusive' to ignore Physics objects with the given tags.

params.name: Tags
params.description: A space-separated list of tags to filter collisions with.

expressions.name: VelocityX
expressions.description: The X component of the object's current velocity, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: VelocityY
expressions.description: The Y component of the object's current velocity, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: AngularVelocity
expressions.description: The object's current angular velocity, in degrees per second.

expressions.name: Mass
expressions.description: The object's physics mass, which is its collision area multiplied by its density.

expressions.name: CenterOfMassX
expressions.description: The X co-ordinate of the object's center of mass.

expressions.name: CenterOfMassY
expressions.description: The Y co-ordinate of the object's center of mass.

expressions.name: Density
expressions.description: The current density of the physics object.

expressions.name: Friction
expressions.description: The current friction of the physics object.

expressions.name: Elasticity
expressions.description: The current elasticity ('bounciness') of the physics object.

expressions.name: ContactCount
expressions.description: The current number of collision contact points.

expressions.name: ContactXAt
expressions.description: The X co-ordinate of a collision contact.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the contact.

expressions.name: ContactYAt
expressions.description: The Y co-ordinate of a collision contact.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the contact.
